channel.title: Comments on: The Forgotten Website Where You Can Get Over 70 Million Free Images
channel.description: Web Ã— Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/the-forgotten-website-where-you-can-get-over-70-million-free-images/#comment-444">Omiebi Eki-Allen</a>.
Almost all the images on the Wikimedia Commons website are given a Creative Commons copyright license and you must give credit to the owner.
However, there are some images that are labelled as <strong>Public Domain. </strong>You do not need to give credit for using such images.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Omiebi Eki-Allen.

Almost all the images on the Wikimedia Commons website are given a Creative Commons copyright license and you must give credit to the owner.

However, there are some images that are labelled as Public Domain. You do not need to give credit for using such images.

item.title: By: Omiebi Eki-Allen
item.dc:creator: Omiebi Eki-Allen
item.description: Is it a must to give credit?
item.content:encoded: Is it a must to give credit?
